string.text: {=str_comment_vassal_introduces_self.vlandia.text}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} of the house of {CLAN_NAME}, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}, and I am honored to serve you.
{=str_comment_noble_introduces_self_and_clan.vlandia.text}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}. Our family has served the French for generations.
{=str_comment_noble_introduces_self_and_clan.vlandia.text}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. We hold our lands in fief to {LIEGE_TITLE}, and we honor our oaths of fealty.

{=str_comment_noble_introduces_self_and_clan.vlandia_honor.text}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}. Our family has stood in the House of Lords and discharged its duties honorably since the first days of the French Kingdom.

{=str_comment_noble_introduces_self_and_clan.vlandia_mercy.text}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}. Though one should not be too proud of one's lineage, I am glad to say that we have always taken seriously our duty to protect the common folk of the French.
{=str_comment_noble_introduces_self_and_clan.vlandia_boasting.text}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}, one of the most illustrious families in the annals of the French.

{=str_comment_noble_introduces_self_and_clan.vlandia_boasting_cruel.text}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}, one of the most illustrious families in the annals of the French. The barbarians we have slain, and the glory we have won, is second to none.

{=str_comment_noble_introduces_self_and_clan.vlandia_boasting_ironic.text}I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. We received our title from the Emperor himself. Not that he had much choice about it, as he was held captive in one of our raiding ships at the time, but I'm sure he recognized the nobility of our blood.
